title: FO-11: UI (Components, State Machine, Pages)
description:
## Scope

Builds the complete FO-11 user interface: copies base components from FO-10, extends FragmentInput with mode="words", creates new step-context and step-tone components, builds the main state machine with skip logic, and registers FO-11 in navigation and overview.

## Spec Reference

`docs/projects/2026-02-11-fo-11/2026-02-11-fo-11-spec.md` — Sections: "Flow", "Discovery Phase Detail", "Heart Animation Transitions", "Reuse from FO-10", "New/Modified Components", "FragmentInput Mode Extension", "Registration"

## Key Files

- `app/fo-11/components/fo-experience.tsx` — Main state machine with 2-3 discovery steps + skip logic
- `app/fo-11/components/step-context.tsx` — NEW: Step 5 with LLM question + fragments
- `app/fo-11/components/step-tone.tsx` — NEW: Step 6 with LLM question + single-word chips
- `app/fo-11/components/fragment-input.tsx` — Extended with mode="words"
- `app/fo-11/page.tsx`, `layout.tsx`, `fo-11-layout-client.tsx` — Page scaffolding
- `app/fo-11/info/page.tsx` — Info page
- `nav.config.ts` — Navigation registration
- `app/overview/page.tsx` — Overview registration

## Worker Instructions

- Complete tasks in order (they build on each other)
- Read `docs/projects/2026-02-11-fo-11/implementation-notes.md` before starting
- Append your learnings to `docs/projects/2026-02-11-fo-11/implementation-notes.md` when all tasks are done
- Use FO-10 components as the primary copy source (`app/fo-10/components/`)
- The types and server actions from Epic A are already in place
- Check epic notes: `tk notes <this-epic-id>`
